arts.ttl: Alaves beats Sevilla while fans protest Friday night games in Spain
arts.sum: Alaves fans ramped up their protest against inconvenient night-time games in Spain when they boycotted the first few minutes of Friday’s La Liga match against Sevilla. Football has traditionally been a sport played at weekends and midweek but more and more European leagues have added games on Friday and Monday nights to satisfy TV audiences and cope with increasing fixture congestion.

arts.ttl: Sevilla FC president promises ‘return to old model’ – while protests rage at his leadership
arts.sum: It’s been a turbulent time recently for Sevilla. Despite winning the Europa League just two seasons ago, the club have seemingly been lacking direction for a while. This is an…

Another stellar weekend of LaLiga action will be headlined by Barcelona's trip to unbeaten Villarreal and Joe Champion has score predictions for that contest and all the other tussles in the Spanish top flight.

arts.ttl: Sevilla welcome back 3 players for Alavés clash
arts.sum: La Liga outfit Sevilla have welcomed three high-profile members of the club’s first-team ranks back to their matchday setup for the club’s next outing. As much was made official across…
